dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2983 IH: Original Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program Safeguarding Eligible Clients Under Reimbursement Enforcement Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Green of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To compensate victims of theft of supplemental nutrition assistance program benefits, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Original Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program Safeguarding Eligible Clients Under Reimbursement Enforcement Act of 2025 or the SNAP SECURE Act of 2025.

section.header: Reinstatement of funding for SNAP benefit replacement
section.text: Section 501(b)(2)(C) of division HH of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2023 (7 U.S.C. 2016a(b)(2)(C)) is amended by striking 2024 and inserting 2034.
